title: Here Lies The Wicked - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Horror   Martial Arts   Mystery   Supernatural
tags: Alternate World   Books   Cultivation   Death   Demons   Fast Cultivation   Ghosts   Heroes   Inheritance   Male Protagonist   Military   Modern Day   Secret Organizations   Skill Books   Skill Creation   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
description: Missing people… Cars mysteriously falling off the Tongjiang Bridge… The world is going mad and it is up to Fang Zheng to prepare himself for it. What will he get himself into? What horrors will he face? Are YOU ready to join Fang Zheng on his journey to hunt the wicked? Ps. Save this one for a lonely midnight.>
